EventHubSettingsControl.ConnectionString: Connection string to the event hub that events will be sent to.\n Looks like this: Endpoint=sb://[ns].servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=[keyName];SharedAccessKey=[key];EntityPath=[eventHubName]
EventHubSettingsControl.EventsPerSecond: The number of events sent to the event hub every second.
EventHubSettingsControl.SendMode: * ClickEvents - Only click events will be sent to the event hub. * PurchaseEvents - Only purchase events will be sent to the event hub. * SimulatedEvents - User behavior will be simulated. Events of both types will be sent.
